extendedInfo.description: Keeping attendance records is required for every hospital, medical school and medical education company in order to comply with accreditation standards.  This app allows each CME event-goer to register themself using Event Callin Event Attendance.Any event, not just CME, that wants to track attendance can utilize this technology.Reduces staff time, eliminate paperwork and errors while enabling the educators to comply with their accreditation criteria.by Clancy Systems

reviews.title: like it
reviews.comment: we\'ve been using the phone and service and like the convenience of this new app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very very convenient! This will revolutionize event registration
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I have been checking in by phone for some time here at the University of Utah. This app will save me some time.
reviews.author: A Google User
